description.en: The course consists of the following subjects: ARKA.01.072 Cardiology 6 ECTS, ARKS.01.024 Pulmonary Medicine and Thoracic Surgery 4,5 ECTS ARSK.01.034 Gastroenterology 4 ECTS, ARSK.01.030 Endocrinology 2 ECTS, ARSK.01.039 Rheumatology 3 ECTS, ARSK.01.032 Nephrology 1,5 ECTS, ARHO.02.004 Hematology 2 ECTS, ARSK.03.012 Laboratory medicine 1 ECTS, ARSK.04.001 Infectious diseases 3 ECTS, Geriatrics Basic Course 1 ECTS. See details under the programmes of the abovementioned subjects.
description.et: Aine koosneb järgmistest ainetest:ARKA.01.072 Kardioloogia 6 EAP; ARKS.01.024 Pulmonoloogia ja torakaalkirurgia 4,5 EAP;ARSK.01.034 Gastroenteroloogia 4 EAP;ARSK.01.030 Endokrinoloogia 2 EAP;ARSK.01.039 Reumatoloogia 3 EAP;ARSK.01.032 Nefroloogia 1,5 EAP; ARHO.02.004 Hematoloogia 2 EAP;ARSK.03.012 Laboratoorne meditsiin 1EAP;ARSK.04.001 Infektsioonhaigused 3 EAP; Geriaatria algkursus 1 EAP; vt detaile loetletud ainete programmidest

objectives.en: The purpose of the course is to provide students the basic competency in the field of internal medicine: the scope of common  diseases, their etiology, pathogenesis, diagnosing, differential diagnosis and treatment.
objectives.et: Sisehaigusteaine õpetamise eesmärk on saavutada üldised teadmised erialast tasemel, mis on vajalik töötamiseks arstina. Aine õpetamisel antakse ülevaade kõigist kompleksainesse kuuluvatest erialadest, vastavate haiguste etiopatogeneesist, diagnoosimisest ja diferentsiaaldiagnostilistest aspektidest ning ravist.

learning_outcomes.en: After completion of the course the students will be able to
1) specify the symptoms and signs, epidemiology, etiology and pathogenesis of major internal diseases;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) on omandanud teoreetilised teadmised sagedasemate sisehaiguste epidemioloogiast, etioloogiast, patogeneesist ja kliinilisest väljendusest;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) demonstrate practical skills in acquiring a complete history and physical examination of a medical patient;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) omavad praktilisi oskusi haige uurimisel sh osates eristada normileidu haiguslikest muutustest;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) differentiate between normal and pathology physical, laboratory and radiological findings in internal medicine
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskavad süsteemselt lähenedes määrata ja interpreteerida laboratoorseid ja instrumentaalseid uuringuid haiguse diagnoosimiseks;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) describe the major indications, adverse events, interactions and contraindications of commonly used drugs in the management of internal diseases
learning_outcomes.et: 4) tunnevadsisemeditsiinis kasutatavaid ravimgruppe ja nende sagedasemaid kõrvaltoimeid ning ravi ja selle jälgimise põhimõtteid;

description.et:
A: The student knows perfectly the clinical picture of various internal diseases, knows in detail the etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of these diseases. Well systematized acquired skills and knowledge.

B: The student knows very well the clinical picture of various internal diseases, knows the etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of these diseases. No significant mistakes are revealed in the examination of acquired skills and knowledge.

C: The student knows well the clinical picture of various internal diseases, knows well the etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of these diseases. During the inspection, some mistakes appear, which are not very important or of a fundamental nature.

D: The student knows the clinical picture of various internal diseases, knows the etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of these diseases. The inspection reveals that there are inaccuracies and some gaps in the systematic knowledge of the subject.

E: The student knows the clinical picture of various internal diseases, generally knows the etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of these diseases. The inspection shows that the systematic and deeper knowledge of the subject is limited and there are fundamental mistakes.

F: The examination reveals that the student's knowledge of the clinical picture, etiopathogenesis, diagnosis and differential diagnosis, treatment and prophylaxis of internal diseases is incomplete.

Before the final exam, it is obligatory to successfully complete the practicum cycles of all specialties and submit an academic medical case history.
The grade obtained for the academic medical case history is calculated in the exam as follows: A-8 points, B-7 points, C-6 points, D-5 points, E-4 points

The student sends the chosen specialty of the academic medical case history and the supervisor name to the internal clinic's academic affairs specialist (eelika.kildvee@ut.ee).
The academic medical case history submitting deadline is one month from the time of access to the patient's data in EHL.
Supervisors submit the grades of the academic medical case history to the exam organizer no later than 12.06 for English groups and 15.06 for Estonian groups.

The exam is written. It is possible to get a maximum of 8 points from the academic medical case history, a maximum of 158 points from the written exam paper. To receive a passing final grade for the exam, no sub-courses can have a score of 0 points. All grading is done on the following scale:
A - 93 - 100%
B = 85 - 92%
C = 78 - 84%
D = 71 - 77%
E = 61 - 70%
F = 0 - 60%

grade_preconditions.et: The course consists of the following subjects: ARKA.01.072 Cardiology 6 ECTS, ARKS.01.024 Pulmonary Medicine and Thoracic Surgery 4,5 ECTS ARSK.01.034 Gastroenterology 4 ECTS, ARSK.01.030 Endocrinology 2 ECTS, ARSK.01.039 Rheumatology 3 ECTS, ARSK.01.032 Nephrology 1,5 ECTS, ARHO.02.004 Hematology 2 ECTS, ARSK.03.012 Laboratory medicine 1 ECTS, ARSK.04.001 Infectious diseases 3 ECTS, Geriatrics Basic Course 1 ECTS.

grade_evaluation.et: Formation of the final grade: Passing all subjects according to the established procedure, positive grade in the medical history, written exam.

debt_elimination.et: In agreement with the professor before the end of the semester.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
